{{disambig-two: '''''brand''''' or '''''brann''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "towering; 'tall and massive'". The form ''brand'' is also said to mean "[[Wiktionary:steeple
an [[Elvish]] word: steeple]]". The words ''brand'', ''brann'' also appear to signify "[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/sublime#English sublime]".<ref name=PE17>{{PE
Exilic Noldorin]] word meaning "lofty, noble, fine".<ref name=LR>{{LR
Tolkien]] apparently used the word ''brann'' to translate "high" in a Noldorin [[Brand (word)#Examples
character in ''[[The Hobbit]]'': phrase inscribed on a draft of Thrór's Map]].<ref name=AI/><ref name=H1/><ref name=Th/>
